page.title: 18THE LINCOLN FESTIVAL.
page.content: {Lincoln Festival of the Arts}is now in its {fourth year }and it is the main festival in the region. From the 1st of May to the 19th there are hundreds of activities going on but the actual {procession}is the best. It marches up from the {Cornhill }to the{Cathedral. Parties of bands, fire eaters, large and small costumes, masks, placards, puppets and pictures make up the procession. Tourists watch, often walking beside them. When they reach the centre of the town at the Cathedral, the{May King and Queen}are crowned by a celebrity. They sit on a throne decorated with flowers and watch country dancing around a Maypole beside them. The main bulk of the festival, is made up with{music}(folk, blues, jazz, rock and classical ), {theatre, poetry, film}and{exhibitions. Pubs, galleries and churches are used.
